#summary Continuous Integration provided by Green Energy Corp

Green Energy is hosting a [https://dev.greenenergycorp.com:8888/hudson/ public Hudson server] that will be provides continuous integration:

  * Tests output from Boost.Test
  * Code documentation generated by Doxygen
  * Code coverage reports
  * Fuzz testing coverage reports

The CI server currently runs the tests on:

  * Ubuntu Server 8.04
  * [http://www.embeddedarm.com/products/board-detail.php?product=TS-7250 Technologic Systems] TS-7250 200Mhz embedded arm
